title: American Horror Story Apocalypse Trailer FINALLY!
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I'm really sad that Jamie Brewer isn't coming back as Addie or Nan though. Hoping that Cordelia brings back Nan or Addie. I'm crossing my fingers that Cordelia and Constance become close which leads to Addie coming back or something....I don't know, just as long as Jamie comes back some how!

Why WAS I RIGHT 8 DAYS BEFORE SEASON 8 OMG I SAID THIS AAHHH😍


(For the trailer the longer one)
If all the dead witches are back, did the apocalypse prompt a resurrection?
I just flipped out when I saw Cody Fern I cannot stop watching it
I think i'm going insane, i'm watching it non stop omg
